title: Drop zone
description: A drop zone allows users to drag and drop files or other content into a designated area.

items.description: File types that are accepted by the drop zone.

actionLabel.description: If undefined, this button does not appear.

onDrop.description: Callback function called when files are dropped onto the drop zone.

onDragOver.description: Callback function called when a file is dragged over the drop zone.

onDragLeave.description: Callback function called when a file is dragged out of the drop zone.
